title: Total Meat Consumption for United States
notes:
Data For June 1934-February 1935, And August-September 1936 Exclude Meats From Slaughter Of Animals Purchased For Federal Surplus Relief Corporation. Source: U.S. Department Of Agriculture, Bureau Of Agricultural Economics, Livestock, Meats, And Wool Market Statistics And Related Data, Through 1944. Data For 1945-1946: Provided By Survey Of Current Business.

This NBER data series m01064 appears on the NBER website in Chapter 1 at http://www.nber.org/databases/macrohistory/contents/chapter01.html.

NBER Indicator: m01064
